text: Ibiri mu birere n’ibiri mu isi byose ni ibya Allah. Kandi mu by’ukuri, twategetse abahawe Igitabo mbere yanyu ndetse namwe ubwanyu ko mugomba gutinya Allah. Ariko nimuhakana, mu by’ukuri (mumenye ko) ibiri mu birere n’ibiri mu isi byose ari ibya Allah, kandi Allah ni Uwihagije, Ushimwa bihebuje
